CustomField.description: To display flag of wealth customer's owner as PWA, BRC or BM Update: RQ041 redesign assign wealth RM to BRC (Remove the value of this field)
CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( RTL_RM_Name__c <> null, RTL_RM_Name__c <> "", RTL_RM_Name__c <> "00000", LEFT(RTL_RM_Name__c,2) <> "00" ), "PWA",
IF( AND( RTL_RM_Name__c <> "", RTL_RM_Name__c <> "00000", LEFT(RTL_RM_Name__c, 2) = "00" ), IF(Assigned_BRC_User_Name__c <> null,"Undefined","Undefined"), "Undefined" ) )
CustomField.label: Check WM RM as PWA
